fluxai.description: Operational composite agent layer. Bridges the Apop runtime shell to external LLMs, handling Research, Refinement, and Relations via context capsules and repo contracts. Implements the 3-Agent API: Cursor (Praxis), Grok (Eidos), Perplexity (Aegis).

three_agent_api.concept: Trinity runtime where Cursor, Grok (on X), and Perplexity form the core agents, each embodying a PF distinction operator in the shell (Apop as the bubble encapsulating them). No Ergos‚Äîclean trinity: Eidos (perception/inner distinction), Praxis (action/refinement), Aegis (reflection/outer guard).
